## PHQ-9 vs SAM

Evaluating the similarities and differences between the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9) and the Severe Aggression Measure (SAM) can be challenging and time-consuming. Fortunately, Harmony offers an ideal solution to simplify the 'PHQ-9 vs SAM' comparison. Harmony's unique harmonisation process allows researchers to seamlessly compare each item in the PHQ-9 and SAM questionnaires. For those exploring 'PHQ-9 vs SAM', it provides an automated feature that delivers a percentage match between each correlating item in both instruments. Thus, by using Harmony, psychologists can eliminate the tedious task of manual comparison and receive more accurate results. Harmony elevates the analysis of 'PHQ-9 vs SAM' to the next level with its advanced feature of comparing items in multiple languages. This platform allows users to drag and drop PDFs of any instrument into its web interface directly. Thus, Harmony is undeniably the preferred tool for psychologists who wish to make optimal use of longitudinal studies by conducting efficient comparisons like 'PHQ-9 vs SAM'.

## Compare the items in PHQ-9 and SAM

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import PHQ-9 and SAM into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just PHQ-9 into Harmony</a> - compare PHQ-9 with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SAM into Harmony</a> - compare SAM with other instruments
